name: Djinn Tamer: Harbinger Farm
description:
Are you a fan of the monster taming genre?  Are you looking for a company that listens to what its players want?  Look no further.

This is our first game in the Djinn Tamer series.  The series is based off of the book trilogy of the same name by Derek Siddoway and AJ Cerna. 

In Djinn Tamer: Harbinger, you take control of our main character, Kai, on his adventure.  He has always wanted to become a Djinn Tamer, but his parents would never support his hobbies.  When his grandfather dies, Kai is left with money to go towards buying his first taming ranch and a Djinn.  Kai's first ranch just happens to be on an island and the ranch is already named Harbinger Farms, so Kai keeps the name.

As you travel the Jiwa region, you will encounter countless tamers who will attempt to best you.  You will be given the choice to stick to good morals or to join along with scams and other evil deeds.  There are many crafting skills your player can learn, you just have to figure out how to get them.

There is also an organization whose main goal is to stop the world from being destroyed.  Will you help them?  The choice is yours.

Keep up-to-date with everything via Discord: https://discord.gg/KnXN48D

Also, there is a Mac version.  Please contact me via Discord for the download link for it... The file was too large to upload on here.
